title: Snake
description: Eat the food, grow longer, and don't hit yourself!
short_description: Classic snake game - eat and grow

instructions.desktop: Use arrow keys to control the snake. Eat the food to grow longer.
instructions.mobile: Swipe to control the snake direction. Eat food to grow.

how_to_play.title: How to Play
items: Use arrow keys to change direction
Eat the red food to grow and score points
Avoid hitting the walls or yourself

tips.title: Pro Tips
items: Plan your path ahead of time
Keep the snake in the middle when possible
Watch for patterns in the food spawning

status.start: Press any arrow key to start!
